definition: Blu-ray disk, Sony high definition DVD disk

sentences.english: I did. There was a blue flash and the set caught alight .
sentences.chinese: 我一打开，蓝光一闪，机子就烧了。

sentences.english: Is there any compatible or performance issue when I use Blu-ray function with this CPU?
sentences.chinese: 那么使用蓝光的功能时会存在一些性能不足的问题吗？

sentences.english: Several DVD and Bluray subtitles fixes.
Under blue light, the spots on this shark fluoresce, creating an eerie glow.
sentences.chinese: 它身上的荧光点在蓝光下散发着诡异的光芒。

sentences.english: A pale blue glow filled the lane.
sentences.chinese: 一道惨白的蓝光就照亮了小路。

sentences.english: A little later, the faint blue glow of the emergency lights went out.
sentences.chinese: 稍过一会，应急灯微弱的蓝光熄灭了。

sentences.english: The pork glowed in the dark but returned to 'normal' in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 这块猪肉在晚上闪着蓝光，而白天却又恢复正常。

sentences.english: The Shanghai blue-ray disc plant is located in the Songjiang Industrial Zone.
sentences.chinese: 上海蓝光光盘工厂位于松江工业区。

sentences.english: Dedicated Blu-ray players start at around $750.
sentences.chinese: 专用的蓝光播放器起价大约750美元。

sentences.english: Blu-ray water drum, a synonym for fashion trend.
sentences.chinese: 蓝光水鼓，一个前沿风尚的代名词。

sentences.english: Only the neon in the cold counter glared a ghostly blue.
sentences.chinese: 只有冷藏柜上的氖灯发出阴惨惨的蓝光。

sentences.english: The first large-scale original pieces of modern music, Blue-ray Water drum.
sentences.chinese: 大型首创原创现代鼓乐曲目《风尚男子蓝光鼓》。

sentences.english: They are looking for the one who has the blue and yellow light over his or her head.
sentences.chinese: 他们想找的都是那种头顶散发蓝光或黄光的上师。

sentences.english: In particular, they enjoy digital cameras, high-definition TVs, DVRs and Blu-ray players.
sentences.chinese: 他们尤其喜欢数码相机，高清电视以及蓝光播放器。

sentences.english: Portable, rechargeable blue therapy light with Bluewave.
sentences.chinese: 产品特点便携式，可充电与蓝光治疗仪。

sentences.english: Mandeni took the oozing blue liquid out of the slave’s hands.
sentences.chinese: 马德里从奴隶的手中接过了那泛着蓝光的液体。

definition: light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
to reflect/reflection (from a mirror etc)/reflex (i.e. automatic reaction of organism)
